title: hamon,lord of striking thunder
desc:
Post 180
-This card cannot be normal summoned/ set, this card can only be special summoned by sacrificing 3  status effects (either from yourself, or global effects,if a player effect is public you can also choose that)
-if this card is summoned in face up attack, choose a player and nullify the effect of the next card they play
-if this card is played in face up defence, you cannot be targeted until your next turn
-alternatively, if this is the only card in your hand, you can discard it and draw a new card instead of regularly drawing a card
